node.display_long_description:
The Blaston World Expansion Update is live! Enter the arena to complete missions, hang out in the newly expanded Ozo Lounge, enter into tournaments, spectate matches, check out new weapons & avatars, and so much more! 
 
● “Best of Quest 2020” - Oculus
● “The game is utterly addicting." 5/5 Review - TheGamer
● “Best New VR Fitness Game of the Year” Winner - VR Fitness Insider
 
Duck, dodge & weave like Neo as you duel players & bots to rise to the top League with your loadout assembled from collected weapons in this competitive slow motion bullet-hell of endless skill & depth from Resolution Games.
 
● Duel players in real-time from around the world
● Level-up to collect weapons of increasing depth
● Participate in officially hosted Blaston tournaments 
● Create your own strategic weapon loadout
● Learn new tricks, add them to your strategy & play style
● Hang out in the Ozo Lounge - play arcade games, fist-bump to start a friendly duel, play darts & take photos to upload to Discord

nodes.title: Blaston World Expansion Update
nodes.body_text:
Do you have what it takes to rise the ranks and be this season’s champion in Resolution Games’ fiercely competitive VR dueling game?
 
The Blaston World Expansion Update is now live! Enter the arena to complete missions, hang out in the newly expanded Ozo Lounge, enter into tournaments, spectate other matches, check out new weapons and avatars, and so much more!
 
Major Additions/Changes
 
New weapon: Vector - Bullets bounce on surfaces. The trick is now to remember that other guns don't!
Mission System (Unlocked at level 5)
Missions reward upgrades (Tier 2 and Legendary)
Mute/block function is added to prevent bad behavior in the Ozo Lounge
Arcade machines on both floors of the Ozo Lounge are back online!
 
Check out the full patch notes in-game and make sure to join the Blaston Community on Discord and Twitter!
 
See you in the Ozo Lounge!
 
The Blaston Team

nodes.title: Game Patch: Nova Helix Update and Ozo Lounge Fixes
nodes.body_text:
Hey Duelists,

We just released a patch with some fixes. Thank you everyone for being patient this past week. We’ve seen you having a little too much fun with the Noxa Helix and are introducing a new, revitalized version. We’ve also fixed some issues with the Ozo Lounge connecting to Discord and are happy to announce that the photo feature is back, as well as the in-game chat monitor.

Check out the full patch notes in-game.

Enjoy! 
The Blaston Team

node.reviewDescription:
The game itself and the concept is very fun to play and exhilarating it can become addictive and very competitive the reason why I’m rating it one star is because of the toxic people that play the game has ruined it for me.. I’m tired of the jacking off gestures and other sexual gestures I’m tired of the loser sign being implemented after the round is over and I have lost and they have one it’s poor sportsmanship like that that ruins the game for me and that’s why I much prefer just to play single player games that are off-line because people nowadays are sick and it really ruins the experience if I was the creator I would remove the hands completely to minimize the toxicity that this game has in it..Remove the hands ... don’t give people the option to do the gestures in the first place and it won’t be a problem....

UPDATE.... I have changed my rating from one star to five star.. The reason being is because the developers reached out to me and are looking into the problem to better serve the game and create a better atmosphere for all players and all age levels... it’s not the developers fault for the poor sportsmanship or the misconduct or the toxic players that play the game... 

I love the competition of this game I love the strategy that is involved to be good at this game but come on people because we really are all playing on the same team we’re all playing the game to win we’re all playing the game because we enjoy it let’s not take that away from other players😊 play on!

developerResponse.body: Hi there, thank you for the review. We're actively looking into this issue and how we can work with making the Blaston experience more enjoyable for everyone. Until we've reached a good solution for this issue in-game, please know that you can report players for these behaviors, and that we look at all reports made by players and take them very seriously. Thank you for playing Blaston!

website_page_meta.description:
Do you have what it takes to climb the ranks and be this season’s champion in Resolution Games’ fiercely competitive bullet-hell dueling game?
 
Join the community & compete within the slow motion VR action of Blaston, which The Gamer calls “utterly addicting.” Prepare to dodge, duck & weave to evade incoming attacks from your opponent in this FPS PvP combat game that combines skill, strategy & speed with an incredible arsenal of futuristic high-tech weapons.
website_page_meta.title: Blaston · Oculus Quest
